abilities.name: Biotic Grasp: Renegeration
abilities.description: Using her left hand, Moira expends biotic energy (resource meter) to heal allies in front of her. Causes a residual heal over time that begins upon the last application of the spray healing. This allows Moira to heal without expending resources. Biotic energy passively regenerates when not in use.

abilities.name: Biotic Grasp: Decay
abilities.description: Her right hand fires a long-range beam weapon that saps enemiesâ€™ health, healing Moira and replenishing her biotic energy. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Fade
abilities.description: Disappear, move faster, jump higher, and become invulnerable, but you cannot shoot. Cannot be activated while affected by mobility-locking effects.

abilities.name: Biotic Orb
abilities.description: Moira launches a rebounding biotic sphere; she can choose between a regeneration effect that heals the allies it passes through, or a decay effect that deals damage to enemies. Dealing damage with Biotic Orb restores a small amount of Biotic Energy. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Coalescence
abilities.description: Moira channels a long-range beam that both heals allies and bypasses barriers to damage her enemies. While channeling this ability, Moira's movement speed increases greatly, but she cannot perform any other actions. Moira's resource generation for Biotic Grasp is 3 times higher while channeling Coalescence. Cannot headshot.
